name: Kryban Chapter 1&2
description:
A tale about labirynth of mirages and creatures residing it.

Please refrain from playing english version until tomorrow, i need to patch up some things!

Short Visual Novel about a girl getting lost in a maze from another world.

Small warning: slight nudity and violence on animals (nothing serious tho).

Other info:

  • Around 20min long (4k words),
  • Available in Polish and English,
  • Kinetic Novel (no choices, just text),
  • Made for NaNoRenO2020 (IntRenAiMo),
  • This demo contains 2 out of 4 chapters that a full version will have.

Story, art and english translation by me

There's a pretty long list of materials (music, sounds and image materials) to not clutter the game page the're included in Credits.txt.

Special thanks:

My family

My friends Pandalke and Ravelin

Image material (hurdle) - https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/47212348
